title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, define the system's scope, and identify key features and functionality.

title: Design System Architecture for AI-powered Career Coaching System (AICareerCoach)
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AI-powered career coaching system (AICareerCoach). This includes the AI model, user interface, data storage components, and integration points. The design should prioritize scalability, maintainability, performance requirements, security, and compliance. Outline the high-level components, their responsibilities, interactions, and data flows. Define the technology stack, deployment strategy, and infrastructure requirements. Ensure the architecture supports continuous integration, continuous deployment, and automated testing. Prioritize modularity, extensibility, and adherence to industry best practices. Suggest a plan for error handling, performance optimization, and monitoring. Furthermore, consider edge cases and potential future scalability challenges.
dependencies: Conduct Market Research and Competitor Analysis

title: Develop AI Model
description: Research, design, and implement the AI model for career coaching and question answering.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the career coaching system, including the web or mobile application.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data, career information, and AI model training data.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure system integrity, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, developer documentation, and maintenance manuals.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Launch System
description: Deploy the career coaching system to a production environment and launch it for public use.
